column11: Figure 1.3: G8 Bilateral and imputed multilateral ODA to Africa (US$ billion current prices)
OECD DAC database, table 2a and OECD Statistics and Development Finance Division, national data for Russia

Bilateral data only available for 2012. No Russia multilateral/bilateral breakdown, so all ODA included under multilateral. No Africa data for Russia for 2003-2008, estimated from total ODA using 2009-2012 average Africa share of ODA (14.4%).
